title: The London Times
comment: Pick up contributions with 1966 Jul-Dec if we itemize
additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
Contributions for the Sunday Times are noted separately.  As of 2025, active contribution copyrights go back further for the Sunday Times than they do for the daily Times.
